Package film

Class FilmManager

java.lang.Object
film.FilmManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilmHandler, FilmViewHandler
public class FilmManager extends Object implements FilmHandler, FilmViewHandler
The FilmManager class manages film data retrieval from the database and updates the GUI. It implements both FilmHandler for data operations and FilmViewHandler for GUI updates.

This class provides functionality for:

  • Retrieving films using various search criteria
  • Mapping database results to Film objects
  • Updating the GUI film view with search results

Database queries support searching by:

  • Film title (partial matches supported)
  • Genre (exact matches)
  • Release year

SQL queries join the film, film_category, and category tables to retrieve complete film information.

Author:
Erica Laub Varpe

      public List<Film> getAllFilms()
      Description copied from interface: FilmHandler
      Retrieves a complete list of all films available in the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllFilms in interface FilmHandler
      Returns:
      a list of all films found in the database, or an empty list if no films are available

    • getFilmByTitle

      public List<Film> getFilmByTitle(String partialTitle)
      Description copied from interface: FilmHandler
      Searches for films based on a partial title provided by the user. This allows for finding films even if only part of the title is known.
      Specified by:
      getFilmByTitle in interface FilmHandler
      Parameters:
      partialTitle - a substring of the film title to search for; it is not case sensitive.
      Returns:
      a list of films whose titles contain the specified search term, or an empty list if no matches are found.

    • getFilmByGenre

      public List<Film> getFilmByGenre(String genre)
      Description copied from interface: FilmHandler
      Retrieves a list of films that belong to a specific genre. This enables users to filter films by genre.
      Specified by:
      getFilmByGenre in interface FilmHandler
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre by which to filter films, matching with the database genre name; it is not case sensitive.
      Returns:
      a list of films that match the specified genre, or an empty list if no matches are found and a pop up saying it doest exist in the database.

    • getFilmByReleaseYear

      public List<Film> getFilmByReleaseYear(int releaseYear)
      Description copied from interface: FilmHandler
      Retrieves a list of films that were released in a specified year.
      Specified by:
      getFilmByReleaseYear in interface FilmHandler
      Parameters:
      releaseYear - the year to filter films by, in YYYY format
      Returns:
      a list of films released in the specified year, or an empty list if no matches are found and a pop up saying it doest exist in the database.
